customCode.label: Ajouter du code js
customCode.value:
d3.selectAll('.axis--x .tick text').text(function(d){return moment(d ).format('YYYY')});
d3.selectAll('.axis--y .tick text').text(function(d){return d+'%'})

helper_text_hooks.text_value:

d3.selectAll('.axis--x .tick text').text(function(d){return moment(d,i ).format('MMMM YYYY')})
